text: Peter Roman Scholl-Latour (March 9, 1924 – August 16, 2014) was a French- German journalist and publicist. He was born in Bochum, Germany. He was of (partly) Jewish descent (his mother was Jewish).www.juedische-allgemeine.de He was known for his books: * Der Tod im Reisfeld [Death in the Rice-fields] (1980) * Allah ist mit den Standhaften [Allah is with the Steadfast] (1983) * Mord am grossen Fluss [Murder at the Great River] (1986) * Leben mit Frankreich [Living with France] (1988) * Afrikanische Totenklage [African Dirge] (2001) He fought in the First Indochina War. Scholl-Latour died in Rhöndorf, Germany, aged 90.Journalist und Autor: Peter Scholl-Latour ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Alumni of the Institut d'études politiques de Paris Category:French journalists Category:French military people Category:German journalists Category:Jewish French writers Category:Jewish German writers Category:Jewish military people Category:People from Bochum
title: Peter Scholl-Latour
